types.name: Inpatient Rehabilitation Center

types.name: Outpatient Treatment Program
types.description: Flexible treatment programs that allow patients to live at home while attending scheduled therapy sessions.

types.name: Detoxification Center
types.description: Medical facilities providing supervised withdrawal management and detox services.

types.name: Sober Living Home
types.description: Transitional housing providing a substance-free living environment for those in recovery.

types.name: Dual Diagnosis Treatment Center
types.description: Facilities specializing in treating co-occurring addiction and mental health disorders.

types.description: Premium treatment facilities offering upscale amenities and highly personalized care.

types.description: Structured outpatient programs with multiple sessions per week while maintaining daily responsibilities.

types.description: Day treatment programs providing structured care during the day with evenings at home.

types.name: Men's Rehabilitation Center
types.description: Treatment facilities designed specifically for men's recovery needs.

types.name: Adolescent Treatment Program

types.name: Christian Rehabilitation Center
types.description: Faith-based treatment centers incorporating Christian principles into recovery.

types.name: Holistic Treatment Center

types.name: Behavioral Health Center

types.name: Addiction Counseling Center
